article: There are many festivals in our school. This month is October. In October, there is a Sports Festival. We have a basketball game and a volleyball game during .... the festival. In the middle of this month, we have an English test during the English Festival. October the nineteenth is the day for a school trip; we go to Beijing with the teachers. On the last day of this month, there is a Music Festival. On that day we can enjoy beautiful songs, dances and piano music. It is really wonderful. Next month, there is an Art Festival. Students often display their pictures on that day.
questions: How many festivals are there in October ?
Which of the following is in November?
options: We can see many pictures during the Arc Festival.
Students play the piano during the Music Festival.
Students go to Beijing on October 19.
There are many festivals in November.
